title: Job Vacancies at Thyaura Partners and Concept Limited
content:
Thyaura Partners and Concept Limited is a facility management company with specialty in commercial facility management, Professional Cleaning, Height Services, Confined Space Cleaning, and Equipment Leasing.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Company Driver

Job Location: Ikeja, Anthony -  Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Safely transport company staff, management, and authorized visitors as assigned
	Ensure punctual pick-up and drop-off in line with official schedules
	Maintain the cleanliness, safety, and good working condition of the company vehicle
	Conduct daily checks on the vehicle (fuel, oil, water, brakes, lights, tyres, etc.)
	Report any mechanical faults or maintenance needs promptly
	Ensure timely servicing, repairs, and vehicle documentation renewals
	Keep accurate records of trips, mileage, and fuel consumption
	Adhere strictly to company policies and road traffic regulations
	Ensure the vehicle is used only for authorized company purposes
	Maintain confidentiality and professionalism at all times
	Assist with basic administrative errands when required
	Avoid reckless driving, unauthorized passengers, or misuse of company vehicles
	Ensure proper parking and security of the vehicle at all times.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 10th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hiring@thyaura.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquiries, contact us via whatsapp on 09036589942.

 

2.) Sales Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Anthony - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement effective sales strategies and action plans
	Set sales targets and monitor team performance against agreed KPIs
	Lead, coach, and motivate the sales team to achieve individual and team goals
	Identify new business opportunities and maintain strong relationships with existing clients
	Conduct market research to identify trends, competitors, and customer needs
	Prepare sales forecasts, budgets, and performance reports for management review
	Negotiate contracts and close high-value deals in line with company policies
	Collaborate with marketing and operations teams to improve product/service delivery
	Ensure proper documentation of sales activities and client interactions
	Represent the company at meetings, presentations, and industry events.


Qualifications


	 Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor`s Degree with 4 - 7 years of experience.


Salary
N350,000 - N500,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 13th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hiring@thyaura.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Housekeeper

Job Location: Banana Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Clean and sanitize rooms, offices, restrooms, and common areas daily
	Sweep, mop, vacuum, and polish floors and surfaces
	Dust furniture, fixtures, and equipment
	Change bed linens and make beds where applicable
	Empty trash bins and dispose of waste properly
	Refill toiletries, cleaning supplies, and other consumables
	Wash, iron, and arrange linens and laundry as required
	Report maintenance issues, damages, or safety hazards promptly
	Follow established cleaning schedules and procedures
	Use cleaning chemicals and equipment safely and correctly
	Comply with health, safety, and hygiene standards at all times
	Respect privacy and confidentiality of occupants and guests
	Carry out other related tasks as instructed by your supervisor.


Salary
N270,000 - N300,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 7th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hiring@thyaura.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires message via Whatsapp ONLY to 09036589942.

 

4.) Skilled Cleaner

Job Location: Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities 


	Clean and sanitize office areas, including floors, desks, windows, restrooms, kitchens, and common areas.
	Empty trash bins, replace liners, and ensure proper waste disposal.
	Dust furniture, surfaces, and equipment to maintain a hygienic work environment.
	Sweep, mop, scrub, and vacuum floors as required.
	Replenish supplies such as toiletries, handwash, sanitizer, and kitchen items.
	Clean and maintain restroom facilities daily.
	Support basic facility tasks such as rearranging furniture and setting up meeting rooms.
	Report any safety hazards, broken items, or maintenance issues to the Admin/Facility Officer.
	Ensure cleaning tools and equipment are properly stored and maintained.
	Perform periodic deep-cleaning tasks (e.g., carpets, windows, external cleaning).
	Assist with errands or simple office support tasks when assigned.


Salary
N60,000 - N100,000 per month

Application Closing Date: 7th January, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hiring@thyaura.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: For more enquires message via Whatsapp ONLY to 09036589942.

Website Developer / Digital Marketer Job at Beaumont Woods and Furnitures




        
    

        
        Beaumont Woods and Furnitures is a furniture manufacturing company based in LEKKI area of Lagos state,we handle woodwork,furniture installation,upholstery and general interior and exterior works.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Website Developer / Digital Marketer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We in need of a talented In- House Website Developer who will be responsible for overseeing our company's sales and interactions with the public by implementing social media platforms' content strategies and be responsible for the designs and construction of E commerce websites.
	To ensure that the sites meets user expectations by ensuring they look good,run smoothly and offer easy access points with no loading issues between pages and error messages.
	Their duties include analyzing engagement data, identifying trends in customer interactions and planning digital campaigns to build community online. also posting and responding to customers on social media .
	The ability to use social media to maintain or to build our brand is necessary to be a Social Media Manager.
	You are expected to regularly post text, video and images that engage the company’s target market, follow online conversations on our company’s social media accounts and solve customer concerns using our social media platforms.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / HND / OND qualification with 3 - 10 years of work experience.
	Communication: Great verbal and written communication skills are essential for this occupation. You must interact with writers, designers, developers and customers and report to senior management personnel. You must identify social media events such as an interesting hashtag or a sensitive topic and share appropriate content that aligns with the company’s social media strategy.
	Creativity: Crafting engaging content is an important skill.
	You must constantly align content with customer trends and market changes to interest and engage people.
	Technology: Computer skills, skills in using social media platforms and skills in using tools that analyze social media platforms are requirements for this position. You must use digital technologies to meet the goals of social media campaigns and website development.
	Research: Skills in learning social media trends, identifying new social media tools and finding real-time online conversations are necessary for this position.
	You must have an understanding of the trends and techniques of social media as well as the company’s online presence to effectively handle our social media marketing.
	Time management: The skill of organizing tasks to meet deadlines is essential for this role.
	You must work according to schedules and must meet marketing and business goals.
	You must be a very good marketer and be able to close sales online .


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bsrecruitslagos@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note


	Interested candidates should not call as only qualified candidates will be contacted.
	Candidates should kindly be informed that accommodation is unavailable.

	We’re looking for an organized and driven individual to join our growing team as an Accountant.

Duties and Responsibilities
You will take charge of the finance department:


	Perform day to day financial transactions, including verifying, classifying, computing, posting and recording accounts receivables and data.
	Prepare bills, invoices and bank deposits
	Reconcile the accounts receivable ledger to ensure that all payments are accounted for and properly posted.
	Perform bank reconciliations - the reconciliation of the bank statement against the GL and reconciliation of any assigned clearing accounts.
	Respond to audit inquiries in a timely manner; as required, make calls to the bank directly to clarify adjustments or to clarify items on the bank statements in order to reconcile activity or properly code it; liaise with auditors to confirm bank balances as of a certain date
	Generate financial statements and reports detailing accounts receivable status
	Prepares asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information.
	Documents financial transactions by entering account information.
	Recommends financial actions by analyzing accounting options.
	Summarizes current financial status by collecting information; preparing a balance sheet, profit and loss statement, and other reports.
	Substantiates financial transactions by auditing documents.
	Maintains accounting controls by preparing and recommending policies and procedures.
	Reconciles financial discrepancies by collecting and analyzing account information.
	Secures financial information by completing database backups.

N200,000 monthly.
